_header: Who will the virtue wit of stones
Subjects: Margaret, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Margaret in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
qwa wil þe vertu wyt of stanisin þe lapidar ma fynd ane
                    is…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þe quhilk he grant ws grace to doþat we ma saufly
                    cum hyme to
